page.title: 07How do we live ?
page.content: The community is a{friendly}one and in general poeple help one another where they see a need. Most families are nuclear and limited in size. Typically the husband is the main provider but many wives have full or part-time jobs. There is a distinct {lack of poverty.} Much of the family life relvolves around the{children's interests.}Most women do their own domestic work and child rearing. {Shopping}is mainly done outside the area. There is an interest in health, well-being and{diet.}Many women are prepared to spend time preparing fresh food as opposed to using convenience food all the time. {Gardening}is a popular pursuit, and many grow some fruit & vegetables. The majority make an effort to improve and maintain their homes & gardens.
